ygData.messageBody:
hehe same here, have every bard item outside PoS (didn't have the time to go
there with my guild) except this inno spear of course. but i still have fun
with my bard, tho i play my wizard mostly, since i can still advance and
there are still items to be gotten.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L41 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
